<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Shifting](/Equipment.aspx?ID=302)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 585 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 225 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** etched onto a melee weapon

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

With a moment of manipulation, you can shift this weapon into a different weapon with a similar form.

<document level="2" id="action-185" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
